data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wang, Zhaohong, Tong, Xiaoli (2017): Variation in colour markings of an unusual new Asprothrips species from China (Thysanoptera, Thripidae). ZooKeys 716: 19-28, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.716.20952, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.716.20952
